title: Ensuring Responsible Development of Digital Assets

enrichment.summary: This executive order directs the U.S. government to create a coordinated approach to the development and regulation of digital assets like cryptocurrencies and central bank digital currencies (CBDCs). It aims to protect consumers, promote financial stability, combat illicit finance and national security risks, and maintain U.S. leadership in the global financial system while supporting innovation and equitable access to financial services.
potential_concerns: Challenges in balancing innovation with consumer protection may slow technological progress or leave gaps in oversight.
The rapid evolution of digital assets could outpace the regulatory frameworks developed, leading to implementation difficulties.
Privacy and surveillance concerns may arise around CBDC design choices and digital asset oversight, potentially impacting civil liberties.
International coordination difficulties may hamper efforts to establish consistent global standards, risking regulatory arbitrage.
Environmental impacts related to cryptocurrency mining and energy consumption may be difficult to mitigate effectively.
